com.appglu
Interface AsyncCrudOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncCrudTemplate, CrudApi
public interface AsyncCrudOperations

AsyncCrudOperations has all methods that CrudOperations has but they execute asynchronously.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
CrudOperations

Method Summary
